column3: but once you get around all that
column4: it's a great place to brunch or even study/work... if you can handle the noise. They have pastries and baked goods galore. When I usually come

column6: either for brunch or to work. I recently ordered the Smoked Duck Tartine
column7: and it was great! The fries it comes with are yummy too! When it comes to the baked goods
column8: it's so hard to decide. It'll range from the macarons to their mini sized pastries or cakes. I like small indulgence.
